Histeria Syok 11.11, Blibli Tawarkan Mobil Diskon 90% Lewat Nge-Game
07 Nov 2019, 13:52 by al - detikInet


Foto: Alfi Kholisdinuka

Jakarta -
Memasuki penghujung tahun, beberapa platform e-commerce sudah mulai mempersiapkan berbagai festival atau pesta belanja online. Beragam cara dan promo dihadirkan untuk menggaet banyak konsumen di momen Hari Belanja Nasional Online (Harbolnas) ini, seperti yang dilakukan oleh Blibli.com.
Sebagai mal online yang berciri khas warna biru, Blibli.com menyambut Harbolnas dengan kemeriahan pesta belanja Hysteria Syok 11.11 yang menerapkan gamification atau penggunaan elemen-elemen permainan. Ini diklaim nya menjadi strategi efektif untuk meningkatkan interaksi konsumen selama berlangsungnya Harbolnas.
"Ini telah menjadi tren baru di Industri e-commerce, dengan menghadirkan games yang di dukung alur cerita, tantangan dan hadiah yang seru, konsumen akan semakin terdorong hingga meningkatkan penjualan online ini," ujar Project Lead Blibli Histeria Syok 2019, Geoffrey L. Dermawan, dalam sambutannya di Aluca International Hall, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Oleh karena itu, Blibli.com, kata Geoffrey, memanfaatkan tren ini dengan meluncurkan mini games di platform aplikasi Blibli.com, termasuk games CAPIT (Cara Belanja Paling Irit) yang menjadi permainan utama selama Harbolnas berlangsung hingga Desember nanti.
"Program pesta belanja termasuk permainan CAPIT ini merupakan komitmen kami dalam memberikan layanan terbaik dan apresiasi bagi para pelanggan Blibli.com. Hingga kini, CAPIT sudah dimainkan setidaknya 470.000 kali oleh para pelanggan," ungkapnya.
Dia menuturkan untuk para pelanggan dapat memainkan CAPIT dengan mengumpulkan lima Token Histeria yang bisa didapatkan setelah berbelanja minimal Rp 100.000 atau bisa dengan cara memberikan ulasan pada produk yang tersedia.
"Keuntungan memainkan permainan ini pelanggan bisa dapat kesempatan menebus berbagai produk dengan harga syok yaitu diskon hingga 90% dan cashback hingga 100% untuk produk pilihan Blibli seperti mobil Honda All New CR-V dan Yamaha NMAX, logam mulia, Led TV, laptop dan ragam produk lainnya," jelas Geoffrey.

Hysteria Shock 11.11, Blibli Offers 90% Discount Car Through Nge-Game
Nov 7 2019, 13:52 by al - detikInet


Photo: Alfi Kholisdinuka

Jakarta -
Entering the end of the year, several e-commerce platforms have begun to prepare for various festivals or online shopping parties. Various ways and promos are presented to attract many consumers in the moment of the National Online Shopping Day (Harbolnas), as conducted by Blibli.com.
As an online mall that has a distinctive blue color, Blibli.com welcomes Harbolnas with the excitement of the Hysteria Shock 11.11 shopping party that implements gamification or the use of game elements. This is claimed to be an effective strategy to increase consumer interaction during the Harbolnas.
"This has become a new trend in the e-commerce industry, by presenting games that are supported by storylines, exciting challenges and prizes, consumers will be increasingly encouraged to increase online sales," said Project Lead Blibli Hysteria Shock 2019, Geoffrey L. Generous , in his remarks at Aluca International Hall, Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019).
Therefore, Blibli.com, Geoffrey said, took advantage of this trend by launching mini games on the Blibli.com application platform, including the CAPIT (Most Economical Shopping) game, which became the main game during Harbolnas lasts until December.
"The shopping party program, including the CAPIT game, is our commitment in providing the best service and appreciation for Blibli.com customers. Until now, CAPIT has been played at least 470,000 times by customers," he said.
He said for customers to be able to play CAPIT by collecting five Hysteria Tokens that can be obtained after shopping for a minimum of Rp 100,000 or by giving a review on the available products.
"The advantage of playing this game is that customers can get a chance to redeem various products with shock prices, which are discounts up to 90% and cashback up to 100% for Blibli products such as Honda All New CR-V and Yamaha NMAX, precious metals, Led TV, laptops and variety. other products, "explained Geoffrey.
